text: Monte Carlo or Bust! is a 1969 comedy movie. In America the title is Those Daring Young Men in Their Jaunty Jalopies. It was made by people in the United Kingdom, France, and Italy. The story is based on the Monte Carlo Rally, a race that started in 1911. The movie is set in the 1920s. It was a very expensive movie. Paramount spent $10 million on it. The story is about a car race across Europe. There are characters from all over the world. They all really want to win. == References == ==Other websites== * * * * * Entry at imcdb.org Category:1969 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:British comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Annakin Category:Movies about automobiles Category:Movies set in the 1920s
title: Those Daring Young Men in Their Jaunty Jalopies
